name: che-java11-maven
description:
Community `maven` image with Java 11, patched to support Eclipse Che workspaces on OpenShift.
- To build this image, see [build_images.sh](https://github.com/eclipse/che-devfile-registry/blob/master/arbitrary-users-patch/build_images.sh)
- To publish this image via CI, see [cico_functions.sh](https://github.com/eclipse/che-devfile-registry/blob/master/cico_functions.sh#L127-L134)

name: che-nodejs10-ubi
description:
UBI nodejs 10 image, patched to support Eclipse Che workspaces on OpenShift. For details, see the [UBI image announcement](https://www.redhat.com/en/blog/introducing-red-hat-universal-base-image)

- To build this image, see [build_images.sh](https://github.com/eclipse/che-devfile-registry/blob/master/arbitrary-users-patch/build_images.sh)
- To publish this image via CI, see [cico_functions.sh](https://github.com/eclipse/che-devfile-registry/blob/master/cico_functions.sh#L127-L134)
